claims.object: Facilitating the production of high affinity antibodies
Participating in the immune response to various types of pathogens

surface_layer.definition: Follicular helper T cells (Tfh) are a type of T cell that facilitate the production of high affinity antibodies and participate in the immune response to various types of pathogens.

deep_layer.mechanism: Tfh cells interact with B cells within germinal centers to promote antibody affinity maturation.
deep_layer.origin: Differentiate from naive T cells in response to antigen presentation.

epistemic_metadata.source: T Follicular Helper Cell - an overview | ScienceDirect Topics
